original_text: For the Lord your God dried up the waters of Jordan from before you, until ye were passed over, as the Lord your God did to the Red sea, which he dried up from before us, until we were gone over:
korean_text: 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 요단 물을 너희 앞에서 마르게 하사 너희를 건너게 하신 것이 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 우리 앞에 홍해를 말리시고 우리를 건너게 하심과 같았나니

sentences.original_text: For the Lord your God dried up
the waters of Jordan from before you
as the Lord your God did to the Red sea
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님이 홍해에 행하신 것같이

sentences.original_text: which he dried up from before us
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리 앞에서 마르게 하신 것
